page.title: 07Lucy Bebbington's day in '85
page.content: I am 11 years old and live at Dearnford Hall which is half way between Tilstock and Whitchurch. I wake up at 6.00 am, get dressed and go down to breakfast (usually cereal).Then I muck out and feed Sorrel.Then I get ready for school, we arrive at 8.55 having travelled by car or cycled in the Summer.School starts at 9.00am .We have assembly followed by English, Maths and various T.V. programs. In the middle of the morning we have a 20 minute break. Lunch is 12.00-1.00. After lunch we do topic work, read, do art/craft and handwriting then we have a short break before games (bowls, tennis, rounders or netball.)School finishes at 3.15 when I get home from school I ride, play tennis or watch T.V.On weekdays I go to bed at 8.00pm.but at the weekend it's 9.00 o'clock.
